name: AnyHeavenMix
description:
AnyHeavenMix is a model I have been using for quite a bit now. It is 50/50 mix of Anything V4.5 (Or Anything V5 if using the AnyHeavenMix5 Version) and Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix.

Credit goes to original uploaders and model mergers.

All images for the original Version have been generated using the Anything V3 VAE.

All images shown past the original Upload date (including the images comparisons) have been generated using the AnyHentai19 VAE.

I've tested this with many different prompts, embeddings, and LoRA's. No model is perfect, but results are about on par with what you would expect from both Anything V4.5/V5 and/or Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix. I would love to see your results below!

And yes, it can do NSFW.

I am also now realizing most of the example images are tomboys and short haired girls, along side a dose of sucrose from Genshin Impact, hmm.

modelVersions.name: AnyHeavenMix5
modelVersions.description:
Instead of a 50/50 merge of corneos7thHeavenMix_v2 and Anything 4.5, its corneos7thHeavenMix_v2 with Anything V5. Feel free to try it out and compare the differences. Right Now I still prefer the original, but this merge has its merits.

Sorry for the lack of variety in the images.

All images for this version were generated using the AnyHentai19 VAE. I found it produces better looking results than the Anything V3 VAE.
